title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip         On some occasions, the education programs are presented by a ranger or park volunteer in living history clothing. NPS photo  The park requests that all large group tours notify us before coming to visit. We receive lots of requests from school groups and bus tours to visit the park, particularly in the spring. We want you to have a pleasant and enjoyable experience without having to compete with other large groups, so scheduling is the key. To Make Reservations: Please contact the park's Education Coordinator, Christy Forman: phone: (703) 361-1339 x1205 email: email us Guided tours and educations programs require advance reservations. Please contact the park at least one month before your planned visit to reserve a date and time. Tour slots are limited and fill up quickly. When reserving a program, please provide the following information:  School name contact person mailing address telephone number email (if available) type of program requested grade level number of students number of adults/chaperones any special needs/requirements.  All guided tours require a 1:10 adult to student ratio.
